column1: Uchi////We finally got a reservation at Uchi! Albeit at 10pm this past Saturday
column2: but it was well worth the wait. We actually weren't seated until closer to 10:30 - place was packed
column3: but there was also some serious disorganization at the hostess desk. We had checked in upon entry
column4: but hostess didn't have noted that we had even arrived 15 minutes after our reservation. I'll blame it on recent opening kinks they will work out
column5: and I didn't let it dampen my excitement for the food.
